attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are sick and tired of forever hearing 'CO2 this and carbon footprint that'. It is high time this was recognised for what it is, an excuse to hinder the developing nations and keep them in poverty by making industrialisation too expensive for them.

It is time there was a reasoned debate and less EcoTaliban-propaganda in the media.
